1.title: Anatomy and Me

episode of.title: RALPH a Man of No Ambition (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Find out all about Ralph's famous anatomical photographs and books. He takes us on an intriguing and enlightening journey of the human body.

2.title: Air Park

episode of.title: RALPH a Man of No Ambition (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: If you want to enjoy some big boys toys then follow Ralph on his visit to an Airpark in Florida where a bunch of pilots show off their aircraft, cars, motorcycles and guns.

3.title: Restoration

episode of.title: RALPH a Man of No Ambition (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: Restoration projects of enormous proportions. Victorian gunboat, Steam Rally, Vintage motor museum all call for commitment by the restorers but " You can do it if you get together with other people and don't forget to include your kids".

4.title: Arts n' Crafts

episode of.title: RALPH a Man of No Ambition (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Art and how to include it in your life and home. Creativity on all levels is good for humans whether originating it or buying it.

5.title: Wood

episode of.title: RALPH a Man of No Ambition (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: From trees to furniture and wonderful antique wooden buildings all things wood commands Ralph's attention.

6.title: Models

episode of.title: RALPH a Man of No Ambition (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: If you want to bond with your kids build a model together. Trains boats and planes are all good subjects for modeling. Follow Ralph and his neighbors son Tadhg as they build a model boat and launch it at a boating lake.

imdb.plot outline: From restoration of just about anything to analyzing anatomical specimens Ralph takes us on an exciting journey of re-discovering the three dimensional world. Old Rolls Royce's, Vintage military aircraft, Traction engines, Victorian gunboats, Arts and Crafts, and Model making are all part of his life. 'The best way to bond with your kids is not through two dimensional computer screens but to get involved together in practical projects using hands, minds and hearts. It's a way of empowering and saving them from a life of practical ineptitude'. Reach for your dreams it's all possible if you let it happen.'Life is serendipitous and if you have no ambition then you are more likely to notice the tangential moments that can shape your future in extraordinary ways'. In this series Ralph sets out to prove that life is serendipitous using his charm, wit and extensive technical knowledge. 'Let go and follow your heart, get out there, do something and see what amazing things can happen!'
imdb.title: RALPH a Man of No Ambition
akas: RALPH a Man of No Ambition (United Kingdom)
plot: Ralph sets out to re-engage people and their children with the 3D world by leaving the flat screen two D world behind for a while. 'If you want to bond with your kids do something in the real world its fantastic!!'::Jonathan Price

From restoration of just about anything to analyzing anatomical specimens Ralph takes us on an exciting journey of re-discovering the three dimensional world. Old Rolls Royce's, Vintage military aircraft, Traction engines, Victorian gunboats, Arts and Crafts, and Model making are all part of his life. 'The best way to bond with your kids is not through two dimensional computer screens but to get involved together in practical projects using hands, minds and hearts. It's a way of empowering and saving them from a life of practical ineptitude'. Reach for your dreams it's all possible if you let it happen.'Life is serendipitous and if you have no ambition then you are more likely to notice the tangential moments that can shape your future in extraordinary ways'. In this series Ralph sets out to prove that life is serendipitous using his charm, wit and extensive technical knowledge. 'Let go and follow your heart, get out there, do something and see what amazing things can happen!'::Jonathan Price
